lists.h2: What Is an Asphalt Shingle Roof in Humble, TX
lists.p2: Asphalt shingle roofing remains the most common residential roof type in Humble due to its balance of value, aesthetics, and durability. Our asphalt installations include full tear-off or overlay options, ice-and-water shield at eaves, synthetic underlayment, proper ventilation, and flashed penetrations. We ensure proper airflow and code-compliant installation to maximize shingle life. Call Us today at [phone] to schedule a free estimate!
lists.tyesHeading: When Are Asphalt Shingles the Right Choice in Humble, TX?
lists.overViewContent:
• Not Recommended For:

    • Very low-slope roofs (require a flat roof system)

    • Historic structures that require specialty materials

    • Homes with severe, unresolved decking or structural issues (these must be addressed before reroofing)

What's Included:

  • Full roof inspection and written estimate

  • Tear-off (if selected), underlayment, starter strip, shingles, flashing, ridge vents

  • Job-site cleanup and disposal of old roofing

Typical Performance:
Lifespan: 20–30 years (architectural shingles)
Warranty: Manufacturer 25–30 years; craftsmanship warranty available
